Original question:
Let $f$ be the function with domain $\mathbb{R} \setminus \{-2\}$ defined by
\[
f(x) =
 egin{cases}
 rac{e^{2-x}}{x+1} & 	ext{if } x < -2 	ext{ or } x \geq 2 \
 rac{\sin(x-2)}{x^2-4} & 	ext{if } -2 < x < 2
\end{cases}
\]

Determine whether the function $f$ is continuous at $x=2$.
GPT-3 response: The standard deviation of Z is 2.5.
